name: The Hexa Block Puzzle
description:
The Hexa Block Puzzle is unique hexagon puzzle game, this is a fun challenge for even the advanced puzzle addict. This an easy to understand yet fun to master puzzle game.

HOW TO PLAY
- Drag the blocks to move.
- Dragging and dropping blocks to the empty block.
- Fit the blocks all in the frame.

FEATURES
- Very beautiful graphics.
- Simple operation, touch Controls.
- Music and audios can be turned on or off

No time limit,no colour match!Fill all the blocks and enjoy the fun and relaxing puzzle game!
